alert.note: Alert for Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 2:07AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following areas, Leon, Liberty and Wakulla. * WHEN...Until 500 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 206 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain has fallen in the last hour. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Arran, Tully, Medart, Shadeville, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Bethel, Hilliardville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Helen, Hyde Park, Shell Point, Wakulla Beach and Liveoak Island. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
